Text: It's just an excerpt with sales pitch. Avoid til real copy available.
It's not a sales pitch... this is the real book. You must not be able to read.

Hi SHILL! Funny, the people who've published my articles in peer-reviewed journals seem to think I can read. 

To those about to waste their time downloading an admittedly interesting SALES PITCH, look at the size: 383K? 

And it's a BOOK?

so in this 41 page document, it says the number one SCREAMING RED FLAG for coming disaster with a woman is on page 120...if this is the full book, waxlrose, where is page 120? Did you even look at this or are you working for the writer?
Shill? What is this? A debate about vaccines? Anyways, everyone knows that the whole "peer reviewed" thing is a scam.
